cdssr 0.0.0.9000

Request groundwater well measurements or search well water levels/geophysical logs

Source: R/get_groundwater.R
get_groundwater.Rd

Make a request to CDSS API /groundwater endpoints to get well measurement data or to search for groundwater wells (water level wells or geo physical log records)

Usage

get_groundwater(
  type = "wellmeasurements",
  wellid = NULL,
  start_date = "1950-01-01",
  end_date = Sys.Date(),
  county = NULL,
  designated_basin = NULL,
  division = NULL,
  management_district = NULL,
  water_district = NULL,
  api_key = NULL
)

Arguments

type

character indicating the type of data to search for. Either "wellmeasurements", "waterlevels", or "geophysicallogs". Default is "wellmeasurements".

wellid

character, indicating the Well ID to query

start_date

character date to request data start point YYYY-MM-DD.

end_date

character date to request data end point YYYY-MM-DD. Default is set to the current date function is run.

county

character, indicating the county to query

designated_basin

character, indicating the designated basin to query

division

numeric, indicating the water division to query

management_district

character, indicating the management district to query

water_district

numeric, indicating the water district to query

api_key

character, optional. If more than maximum number of requests per day is desired, an API key can be obtained from CDSS.

Value

dataframe with groundwater well data

Examples

# Request endpoint: api/v2/groundwater/waterlevels/wellmeasurements
well_measure <- get_groundwater(
type   = "wellmeasurements",
  wellid = 1274
 )
#> Downloading data from CDSS API...
#> Groundwater well measurements

# plot depth to water
plot(well_measure$depth_to_water~well_measure$datetime, type = "l")


# Request endpoint: api/v2/groundwater/waterlevels/wells
water_levels <- get_groundwater(
  type     = "waterlevels",
  division = 2
 )
#> Downloading data from CDSS API...
#> Searching groundwater wells (waterlevels)

# number of unique well IDs from query
length(unique(water_levels$well_id))
#> [1] 6339

# Request endpoint: api/v2/groundwater/geophysicallogs/wells
geophysicallogs <- get_groundwater(
  type     = "geophysicallogs",
  division = 2
)
#> Downloading data from CDSS API...
#> Searching groundwater wells (geophysicallogs)

# number of unique well IDs from query
length(unique(geophysicallogs$well_id))
#> [1] 893
